title: Denver the last dinosaur. 3. Dinoland
brief_description: When Heather gets a job at a dinosaur theme amusement park, Denver roams freely around the park and fits right in with all the dino-costumed employees. But when the roller coaster gets stuck with kids on board, Denver risks exposing his true identity to perform a daring and heroic rescue.
